# mirascope.core.base.dynamic_config

## <ApiType type="Module" module="mirascope.core.base.dynamic_config" path="core/base/dynamic_config" symbolName="dynamic_config" /> dynamic_config

The base type in a function as an LLM call to return for dynamic configuration.

## Classes
